Articles.Content:
i have been going around forums for a long time and played KSP for longer and i only ask for one thing to be made for .22 which is just a deploy-able ramp/ramps that are varied in size for bases and rovers because even though i have seen the usage of landing gear for ramps and cargo bays, it would be so much easier to just make some ramps and end this....

just a suggestion for stock KSP but should be fairly easy because even though this counts in way like moving parts but it would really classify under the same category as ladders and landing gear
May I suggest MagicSmokeIndustries mod. Lots of moving and rotating parts to construct the ramp you want.
i know about MSI but i mean just for stock so that the need for mods to make a ramp would not be required
I would really like a stock pat like that, it's a real pain to keep updating all of those mods

i know what is on the not to suggest list in fact i listed at the top that this would fall more under the category of things such as ladders or landing legs/gear which technically are also moving parts so all in all the idea of stock ramps would still be feasible as i have explained how it wouldn't count as not to suggest....

sorry for double posting but i still think that this would not only be easy to implement in the future but doesn't violate the rules involving not to suggest as it would classify as a ladder for rovers
